details.title: Trust vote tabled in Rajasthan Assembly
details.content: Rajasthan's Law and Parliamentary Affairs Minister Shanti Kumar Dhariwal tables proposal for a trust vote, in the state assembly.

I was safe on the seat I used to sit on earlier. Then I thought why have I been allotted a different seat. I saw that this is the border - ruling party on one side, opposition on other. Who is sent to border? The strongest warrior: Sachin Pilot, Congress in Rajasthan Assembly

details.title: Sachin Pilot takes the floor
details.content: Be it me or any friend of mine, we consulted the 'doctor' and all 125 of us are standing in the House today after 'treatment'...There may be bombardment at this border but we will be the armour and keep it everything safe: Sachin Pilot, Congress MLA, in Rajasthan Assembly

details.title: State parliamentary affairs minister Dhariwal
details.content: Replying to the debate on the motion, Dhariwal blamed the Centre for trying to "topple" the governments in Madhya Pradesh, Manipur and Goa, using money and power, but said a similar attempt in Rajasthan would not succeed. Referring to Akbar, he said the Mughal emperor had to taste defeat in Mewar of Rajasthan during his quest to expand his empire.

details.title: Rajasthan CM in state assembly
details.content: Are agencies like ED, CBI and Income Tax department not being misused in the country? When you hold conversation on telephone, don't you say the other person to join you on FaceTime and WhatsApp. Is this good thing in a democracy?: Rajasthan CM Ashok Gehlot in State Assembly
Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot led Rajasthan Government wins vote of confidence in the State Assembly.

details.title: Results in our favour despite opposition attempt: Pilot
details.content:
The vote of confidence which was brought by the govt has been passed with a very good majority today in the #Rajasthan Assembly. Despite various attempts by the opposition, the result is in favour of govt: Congress leader Sachin Pilot pic.twitter.com/IwIX6OVidw

— ANI (@ANI) August 14, 2020

details.title: Trust vote has brought a new light today: Surjewala
details.content:
आज प्रजातंत्र के कई कोनों में व्याप्त अंधकार के लिए राजस्थान का “विश्वासमत” एक “नई रोशनी” लेकर आया है।

आज राजस्थान के 8 करोड़ नागरिकों के विकास की “असीम संभावनाओं का विश्वास” नफ़रत, नकारात्मकता और निराशा को परास्त कर जीत गया है ।
1/2#RajasthanPolitics

— Randeep Singh Surjewala (@rssurjewala) August 14, 2020

details.title: Trust vote has ended all suspicions: Pilot
details.content: This has put a full stop on all suspicions that were rising. A roadmap has been prepared for all the issues that were being raised. I have complete faith, that roadmap will be announced timely: Pilot

details.title: Pilot on change in seating arrangement
details.content: Earlier, I was part of the govt but now I am not. It is not important where one sits, but what is in the hearts and minds of people. As far as the seating pattern is considered, it is decided by speaker & party & I don't want to comment on it: Sachin Pilot, Congress

details.title: Maharashtra's youngest MLA on trust vote
details.content:
Congress wins the trust vote in Rajasthan Assembly.#SatyamevaJayate #DilSeCongress pic.twitter.com/Nf1yJ4gfP2

— Zeeshan Siddique (@zeeshan_iyc) August 14, 2020
